name: Alireza Latifi
description: Frontend developer with an entrepreneurial spirit

sections.title: About
sections.content:
Previously led the front-end development of a startup, gaining strong ownership, initiative, and team mentorship experience. Skilled in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, with a passion for clean code, efficient workflows, and thoughtful UX.
Brings a product-oriented mindset, self-management, and clear communication to every project — shaped by previous experience in product-focused roles.
